name: Android Hunter
description:
The year is 2029.

A Mysterious computer virus leaked onto the internet causing ordinary house hold Androids to go rogue. They now rule the streets.

You are a member of an elite squad of half-man, half-machine soldiers, whos mission is to rid the streets of the Androids. All you have is your gun, infinite cardio and extremely powerful legs.

The game is an endless runner with shooting elements. Shoot enemies and avoid the obstacles.

This game is no walk in the park, can you beat it?

X key = jump.

C key = shoot.

Down key = duck.
